sys_atf_test.description: Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Pick a correct user to impersonate, a user with the right roles. 2. Search for a Catalog Item 3. Open a catalog item. 4. Set quantity on a catalog item page. 5. Set variable values on a Catalog Item page 6. Validates Variable values on the Catalog Item. 7. Edit the mandatory, non mandatory, read only, non read only, visible and non visible variables. 8. Add Catalog Item to Shopping Cart 9. Order a catalog item
sys_atf_test.name: access card-service catalog itemDesign
